name: DanceAble 2025
description:
Join us for an all-inclusive dance party for those 10+! Created for people of all abilities to enjoy a fun event taking place right on Toronto’s waterfront. This party is specifically created for those with varying ability levels to be able to let loose and enjoy. This evening will be upbeat, fun, and welcoming for all who attend.

Pizza is limited to one slice per attendee, first come first served. We suggest that you do not arrive on an empty stomach! Care facilities and day programs are welcome. Families are welcome to bring children, family, and friends, however, supervision is required.

organizer.name: Variety – the Children’s Charity of Ontario & Variety Village

name: Celebrate Italy
description: Columbus Concert Band commemorates Italian Heritage Month with an unforgettable concert celebrating Italy's rich musical traditions. Under the baton of Annamaria Mazzaferro, this award-winning ensemble will present an eclectic repertoire, including masterpieces by classical composers like Puccini, timeless hits from legendary Italian-American singers Frank Sinatra and Dean Martin, vibrant jazz numbers, and treasured regional songs. Don't miss the grand finale of their 2025 season!
